task.title: Enable Livefyre Identity
task.shortdesc: Enable the Livefyre Identity package to allow your users to log into your Livefyre Apps using an email, Twitter, Facebook, Yahoo!, or Google login.

step.cmd: Create the required social media apps.
Use Studio to add keys to your Livefyre implementation.
Add the package to the page using Livefyre.js and Livefyre.require.
